name: modularly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that consists of separate parts that, when combined, form a complete whole: Large computer systems are often built modularly. These modularly built homes are designed to the same standards as any new home.
education
  specialized in a way that consists of several units of teaching that together make a complete course, especially at a university or college in the United Kingdom : The course is structured modularly, giving students a more flexible choice of options. The units are organized modularly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe system is designed modularly so that the required parts can be changed as necessary.Courses in our corporate learning centre are organized modularly.
